_sText:
--aim_forlorn--

-Details
4 Secret Access ways
All Roofs Accessible
Intricate Tunnel System
All windows are breakable
Custom dev_ textures

Good map for any weapon
Good practice for listening skills

-Build Information

++Layout
----2 Hours

++Architecture
----18 Hours

++Textures
----30 Minutes

++Beta Testing
----8 Hours   (<--- Beta Testers did not want to stop playing)

-Secret Access Ways
1. T-Spawn Building left Corner (func_breakable)
2. T-Spawn Basement (func_breakable)
3. Hole in the Ramp In front of the Green " hut " (func_breakable)

-Glass
1. All Glass is breakable via bullets or nades.
2. Trim is actual brush architecture

-Optimization
1. Fully optimized with no-draw leading to a constant rate of fps.

-Architecture / Crates / Windows
1. All brush architecture
2. Lights were made using the carve command, made to simulate the ones used in aim_ag_texture_city
3. All roofs and buildings are full accessible.


Please try this map, you may be surprised by the gameplay. Very fun and amusing when with friends. Especially when you jump off of buildings into the secret access ways. Or if you blast through a wall and into a foe.
